attributes.action: Stopping Insurance companies Voiding policies and penalizing people for ever
attributes.additional_details:
Insurance companies penalize people by Voiding there policies some are for good reason some are accidental.

This blunder has to be admitted for the rest of your life , and will need to be admitted for all insurance you will need or want to purchase , and be forced too pay sky high premiums. which is grossly unfair. this system needs to be abolished. as why should you need to admit it ? VOID does mean never existed or happened so why admit it?
